comment._content: Probably Jeremiah D. Botkin, politician from Kansas -- appointed warden of the state penitentiary at about this time: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jeremiah_D._Botkin

comment._content:
rjones0856:

I was able to further confirm Mr. Botkin's identity through references here in the Prints and Photographs Division, so we will expand the name and other information about him when we update. Thanks!
